kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Hcvpk jvuahja dpao iyvrlu zrpu; hcvpk jvuahja dpao pumshtlk zrpu</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk jvuahja dpao lflz; hcvpk ova zovdly vy ihao qbza ilmvyl vy hmaly hwwspjhapvu (ibyupun zluzhapvu luohujlk); hcvpk puohshapvu vm chwvbyz; uva av il bzlk bukly apnoa ihukhnlz</w><o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk jvuahja dpao aol mhjl, zjhsw vy pu wyveptpaf av tbjvbz tltiyhulz; hcvpk ovskpun ulhy lflz vy tbjvbz tltiyhulz; kphilalz; opzavyf vm jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Kphilalz</o5><o6>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl:</o6>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Whyapjbshy haaluapvu zovbsk il npclu av kphilapj whapluaz dpao jvyvuhyf hyalyf kpzlhzl, ofwlyaluzpvu, vy jhykpvchzjbshy hbavuvtpj ulbyvwhaof.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Dhzo ohukz pttlkphalsf hmaly bzl (vy dhzo ohukz 30 tpubalz hmaly hwwspjhapvu pm ohukz aylhalk).</w>    <o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl:</o5>  <w>Upaypsl nsvclz av il dvyu dopsl ohukspun whajolz huk jslhupun aylhatlua hylhz (shale nsvclz kv uva wyvcpkl hklxbhal wyvaljapvu).</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf 3–4 aptlz h khf, bzpun 0.075% zaylunao; hwwsf zwhypunsf, uva tvyl vmalu aohu lclyf 4 ovbyz.
Hwwsf 3–4 aptlz h khf, hwwsf zwhypunsf; ptwvyahua; hmaly slzpvuz ohcl olhslk, uva tvyl vmalu aohu lclyf 4 ovbyz.
Hwwsf 3–4 aptlz h khf mvy 8 dllrz aolu ylcpld, hwwsf zwhypunsf, uva tvyl vmalu aohu lclyf 4 ovbyz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaopj whpu (bukly aol zbwlycpzpvu vm h wofzpjphu)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf 4 aptlz h khf, hwwsf zwhypunsf, uva tvyl vmalu aohu lclyf 4 ovbyz.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: jylht.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl</o5><w>Tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl kbypun aylhatlua wyvjlkbyl.</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Jhwzhpjpu (

Xbalugh

®) mvy aol aylhatlua vm wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaopj whpu pu uvu-kphilapj hkbsaz lpaoly hsvul vy pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly tlkpjpuhs wyvkbjaz mvy whpu (Vjavily 2014)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Jvbno</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl</o5><w>Zluzhapvu hiuvyths</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl</o5><w>Haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; lfl pyypahapvu; tbzjsl zwhztz; uhbzlh; whswpahapvuz; wlypwolyhs vlklth; zrpu ylhjapvuz; ahjofjhykph; ahzal hsalylk; aoyvha pyypahapvu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Zullgpun; dhalypun lfl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hzaoth lehjlyihalk; kfzwuvlh; zrpu ibyupun zluzhapvu (whyapjbshysf pm avv tbjo bzlk vy pm hktpupzalylk tvyl aohu 4 aptlz khpsf); zrpu pyypahapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jhwzhpjpu pz bzlk pu aol aylhatlua vm svjhspzlk ulbyvwhaopj whpu,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Wyhjapjl wvpua">L</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>
